name: Finished Object
description:
Finished Object is an unfinished game by Jessica Crabb, Chad Ellis, Chandler Candela, and Evan Hill.

Story

Welcome to New Satilla, a sleepy seaside town known for its family-friendly promenade, quaint downtown, and artist residency program.

You're the newest artist-in-residence with a past in blown glass. You've signed up as a generalist to assist any of the community's disciplined artisans that could use an extra pair of hands.

As you travel between studios, you gain cards – books, materials, tools, and equipment – and get to know the town's assistants, artisans and their trusty companions as you collaborate on meaningful projects that result in finished objects.
